entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
